channel.title: Death Knight Ability lacks text
channel.description: The Death Knight protection ability does not specify that it ignores night death immunity. That should probably be fixed.

item.title: Death Knight Ability lacks text
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
It assumed that it goes through night immunity because like all defenses hunter’s bear and knight protection it goes through immunity. I mean like it’s more so that most veterans know and that new players don’t know.

Read full topic
